mapper.insert: INSERT INTO detailintro (contentid,agelimit,eventplace,eventstartdate,eventenddate,festivaltype, bookingplace,placeinfo,playtime,program,progresstype,spendtimefestival,sponsor1,sponsortel1, sponsor2,sponsor1tel2,subevent,usetimefestival) VALUES (#{contentid},#{agelimit},#{eventplace},#{eventstartdate},#{eventenddate}, #{festivaltype},#{bookingplace},#{placeinfo},#{playtime},#{program},#{progresstype},#{spendtimefestival} ,#{sponsor1},#{sponsortel1},#{sponsor2},#{sponsor1tel2},#{subevent},#{usetimefestival}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE agelimit=#{agelimit},eventplace=#{eventplace},eventstartdate=#{eventstartdate}, eventenddate=#{eventenddate},festivaltype=#{festivaltype},bookingplace=#{bookingplace},placeinfo=#{placeinfo}, playtime=#{playtime},program=#{program},progresstype=#{progresstype},spendtimefestival=#{spendtimefestival}, sponsor1=#{sponsor1},sponsortel1=#{sponsortel1},sponsor2=#{sponsor2},sponsor1tel2=#{sponsor1tel2}, subevent=#{subevent},usetimefestival=#{usetimefestival},updatedate=SYSDATE()

INSERT INTO detailinfo (contentid,infoname,infotext,infoname2,infotext2) VALUES (#{contentid},#{infoname},#{infotext},#{infoname2},#{infotext2}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE infoname=#{infoname},infotext=#{infotext}, infoname2=#{infoname2},infotext2=#{infotext2},updatedate=SYSDATE()

INSERT INTO detailcommon (contentid,createdtime,addr1,areacode,firstimage,firstimage2,homepage,mapx ,mapy,modifiedtime,overview,tel,telname,title,zipcode,sigungucode)
VALUES (#{contentid},#{createdtime},#{addr1},#{areacode},#{firstimage},#{firstimage2}, #{homepage},#{mapx},#{mapy},#{modifiedtime},#{overview},#{tel},#{telname},#{title},#{zipcode},#{sigungucode})
